revised_title: An Eighth Memoir on Quantics: Covariants and Syzygies of the Binary Quintic
tldr: This article delves into the mathematical theory of quantic equations, specifically the binary quintic, focusing on covariants and syzygies. The author establishes a more general theory for determining the character of equations of any order and applies it to the quartic and quintic equations. The article also discusses the Tschirnhausen transformation and the canonical form used in the investigation of the quintic equation.
